name: CSD
description:
Climbing Sand Dune
CSD is nitro-fuelled drag racing game! Race, Tune, Upgrade and Customize some of the hottest cars around the globe.
Setting a new standard in visual environment & blockbuster gameplay, CSD promise to deliver hyper-real gaming experience on your palm. Fire up your Turbo and be the first to cross the finish line!
EASY TO PLAY, HARD TO MASTER - Play a quick race in a spare minute or play the solo game and earn daily rewards. Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your progress is backed up.
UPGRADES & TUNE
• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings, upgrade engine and much more.
• Visual upgrade is better than never before, completely change the looks of the car specifically as you want. Modify Hood, Side Spoiler, Front and Rear Bumpers etc.
MASTER MULTIPLE MODES!
• Challenge opponents in Drag Race & Climbing challenge.
• Play with friends and other online multiplayer in free roam. Hunting down the camel in free roam.
• Beat the opponent from around the world in asynchronous races!
COMPETITIVE ONLINE MULTIPLAYER:
Playing on your own may be fun enough, but the ultimate challenge is in the "Online" section. Go head-to-head against your friends or random racers. BEAT THE CREWS and you’ll rule the desert. Tune out their trash talk. Beat each player and be the new king of the desert.
AWESOME COMMUNITY
It's all about the players! Connect with other car game fanatics and enjoy Drag Racing together:
TROUBLESHOOTING:
- If the game doesn't start up, runs slowly or crashes, please get in touch and we'll do our best to help.
If you have any questions contact us through our Support system: https://umxstudio.co/en#contact-us or via e-mail at support support@umxstudio.co
